metadata.title: Hotel Lepanto Guesthouse | Your ideal stay in Malta
metadata.description: Automated guesthouse with smart locks in Malta. Enjoy a unique and comfortable experience in the heart of the Mediterranean.
metadata.keywords: hotel malta, guesthouse malta, accommodation malta, smart locks, malta vacation

hero.title: Your ideal experience in Malta
hero.subtitle: Enjoy a comfortable and modern stay with automated access, in the heart of Malta.

automatedCheckin.title: Automated Check-in
automatedCheckin.description: Forget about restrictive schedules and receptionists. Access anytime with our smart lock system and enjoy total privacy and flexibility.

coworkingArea.title: Coworking Area
coworkingArea.description: Relaxing dedicated space to work with high-speed WiFi and everything you need to be productive during your stay.

breakfastService.title: Breakfast Service
breakfastService.description: Start your day with energy thanks to our delicious breakfast with local products and options for all tastes.

primeLocation.title: Prime Location
primeLocation.description: We are located just a few minutes walk from Malta's main attractions, beaches and restaurants. The perfect location to explore the island.

rooms.sectionDescription: All our rooms feature smart locks, air conditioning, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

bookOnline.title: Book online
bookOnline.description: Select your room and dates through our booking system.

digitalCheckin.title: Digital check-in
digitalCheckin.description: Complete digital check-in from your mobile, no need to wait at reception.

receiveCode.title: Receive your code
receiveCode.description: After checking in, you'll receive a unique code to access your room.

enjoyStay.title: Enjoy your stay
enjoyStay.description: Relax and enjoy your stay with complete privacy.
